CustomField.description: This will connect to DocuSign Production environment. Also add “Production Server Pod:” to any one of the value “{DEMO, PROD,NA1,NA2,EU1,WWWSTAGE1}” Unchecked will be connected to Demo Server.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This will connect to DocuSign Production environment. Also add “Production Server Pod:” to any one of the value “{DEMO, PROD,NA1,NA2,EU1,WWWSTAGE1}” Unchecked will be connected to Demo Server.
CustomField.label: Production Environment?
